Singleton Pattern.text: Ensures a class has only one instance and provides a global point of access to it.
Singleton Pattern.code: public class Singleton { private static Singleton instance; private Singleton(){} public static Singleton getInstance() { if (instance == null) instance = new Singleton(); return instance; } }

CAP Theorem.text: In a distributed computer system, you can only provide two of the following three guarantees: Consistency, Availability, and Partition Tolerance.
